General.Name: Bluecom Co. Ltd
General.Description: Bluecom Co., Ltd. operates as a wireless technology company in South Korea and internationally. Its products include Bluetooth stereo and mono headset products, Bluetooth modules, micro-speakers, receivers, and linear motors. The company was formerly known as Sambu Communics Co., Ltd and changed its name to Bluecom Co., Ltd. in December 2006. Bluecom Co., Ltd. was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Incheon, South Korea.
